member.name: M:CefSharp.Internals.JavascriptBinding.BindingHandler.GetChangeTypeCost(System.Object,System.Type)
member.summary: Gets the cost of changing the type an object to another type.
member.return: The conversion cost, or -1 if no conversion available. Lower cost is better.

member.name: M:CefSharp.Internals.JavascriptBinding.UnmanagedWrapper.Get
member.summary: Gets a reference to the wrapped object.

member.name: T:CefSharp.Internals.JavascriptBinding.UnmanagedWrapper
member.summary: Acts as an unmanaged wrapper for a managed .NET object.

member.name: M:CefSharp.convertFromCef(CefRefPtr<CefV8Value>)
member.summary: Converts a Chromium V8 value to a (managed) .NET object.
member.param: The V8 value that should be converted.

member.name: M:CefSharp.convertToCef(System.Object,System.Type)
member.summary: Converts a .NET object to an (unmanaged) Chromium V8 object.
member.param: The .NET object that should be converted.
The type of the source object. If this parameter is a null reference, the type will be determined automatically.

member.name: M:CefSharp.toNative(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a .NET string to native (unamanged) format. Note that this method does not allocate a new copy of the string, but rather returns a pointer to the memory in the existing managed String object.
member.param: The string that should be converted.
member.returns: An unmanaged representation of the provided string.

member.summary: Converts an unmanaged string to a (managed) .NET string.
member.param: The string that should be converted.

member.summary: Converts an unmanaged string to a (managed) .NET string.
member.param: The string that should be converted.

members.member: respond with redirection to the provided URL

member.name: P:CefSharp.SchemeHandlerResponse.ResponseStream
member.summary: A Stream with the response data. If the request didn't return any response, leave this property as null.

member.name: M:CefSharp.ISchemeHandler.ProcessRequestAsync(CefSharp.IRequest,CefSharp.SchemeHandlerResponse,CefSharp.OnRequestCompletedHandler)
member.summary: Processes a custom scheme-based request asynchronously. The implementing method should call the callback whenever the request is completed.
member.param: The SchemeHandlerResponse object in which the handler is supposed to place the response information.
A callback which the handler is supposed to call once the processing is complete. The callback may be called on any thread.
member.returns: true if the request is handled, false otherwise.

member.name: T:CefSharp.RtzCountdownEvent
member.summary: Return-To-Zero latch, signals whenever count is zero
